song.title: Play, Beeper, play!
song.info:
(February 2006)
This is *NOT* AY! This is a chiptune with sound-quality of ONE BIT (sound turn-on, sound turn-off, nothing more). Generated by Z80 chip with ULA chip as a transducer.
Author's note: "3 channels (including drums). This time I used again Orfeus Music Assembler and also made a small routine in BASIC (with BEEP commands). As Orfeus has some envelopes (not editable â€˜though) I made attempt to do a delay effect in 1-bit music. Sounds pretty cool. "
http://mister_beep.republika.pl/music.html
